info.name: Synkkafrica Backend API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Synkkafrica Backend including authentication, business management, listings, bookings, notifications, transactions, disputes, admin management, and support ticket system.

## ðŸŽ« Support Ticket System

Comprehensive customer support and ticketing system for handling customer inquiries, technical issues, and business complaints.

### Key Features
- Multi-category ticket management (Account, Booking, Payment, Technical, Business, Refund, Verification, General)
- Real-time messaging with WebSocket support
- File attachments support
- Priority levels (Low, Medium, High, Urgent)
- Auto-generated ticket numbers (TKT-YYYY-NNNNN)
- Email notifications (creation, reply, status updates)
- Permission-based access control
- Internal notes for admin team
- Comprehensive statistics and reporting

### Support vs Disputes

**Support Tickets** are for general platform support:
- Account questions
- Technical issues
- Platform navigation help
- Business verification queries
- General inquiries

**Disputes** are for transaction-specific conflicts:
- Payment issues
- Service not delivered
- Quality complaints
- Refund requests related to bookings

See SUPPORT_VS_DISPUTES.md for detailed integration guide.

### Access Control

**Customers & Vendors:**
- Create tickets for any issue type
- View only their own tickets
- Add messages and close tickets
- Endpoints: `/support/tickets` (no /api prefix)

**Support Managers:**
- View all tickets with advanced filtering
- Update status, priority, and assignments
- Add replies and internal notes
- Access statistics and agent performance
- Required permissions: `SUPPORT:VIEW`, `SUPPORT:MANAGE`
- Endpoints: `/api/admin/support`

**Super Admins:**
- Automatic access to all support features
- Can manage support managers

### Setup Support Manager

Create an admin user with support permissions:

```json
POST /api/admin/team
{
  "email": "support@synkkafrica.com",
  "password": "SecurePassword123!",
  "firstName": "Support",
  "lastName": "Manager",
  "adminRole": "SUPPORT_MANAGER",
  "department": "Customer Support",
  "permissions": [
    { "module": "SUPPORT", "actions": ["VIEW", "MANAGE"] }
  ]
}
```

### Documentation
- Full API Reference: `docs/SUPPORT_TICKET_SYSTEM.md`
- Integration Guide: `docs/SUPPORT_VS_DISPUTES.md`
- Quick Start: `SUPPORT_SYSTEM_README.md`

request.description: Admin endpoint to approve vendor verification. This approves all businesses associated with the vendor. Requires admin access token.
Admin endpoint to reject vendor verification. This rejects all businesses associated with the vendor. Requires admin access token.

request.description: Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including total orders, revenue, reviews, recent activity, top services, bookings, and customer statistics
Accept a pending booking request. Only business owners can accept bookings for their own listings. Changes status from PENDING to CONFIRMED and sends confirmation email to customer.

Reject a pending booking request with reason. Only business owners can reject bookings for their own listings. Changes status from PENDING to REJECTED and sends rejection email to customer with the specified reason.
Upload business verification documents (CAC, Tax ID, Insurance, Bank Statement, etc.)

body.raw:
{
  "cacNumber": "RC1234567",
  "taxId": "TIN-123456789",
  "bankName": "First Bank Nigeria",
  "accountNumber": "0123456789",
  "accountName": "Luxury Car Rentals Nigeria Ltd"
}

request.description: Update business verification information including CAC number, tax ID, and bank details
Get business verification status and submitted documents
Admin endpoint to approve business verification
Admin endpoint to reject business verification with reason
Create a new dispute. Types: CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT, PAYMENT_ISSUE, SERVICE_ISSUE, REVIEW_RATING, OTHER
Get all disputes (filtered by user role - customers see their disputes, vendors see their business disputes, admins see all)
Filter disputes by type, status, and priority
Get dispute statistics including total, by status, by type, and average rating (for vendors)
Get dispute details with all messages
Add a message/reply to an existing dispute. Customers, vendors, and admins can all add messages.
Admin only: Update dispute status, priority, or assignment
Admin only: Mark dispute as resolved with resolution notes
Admin only: Close dispute (no further messages can be added)
Login with super admin credentials (stored in .env). On first login, creates the super admin user automatically.
Login for team members created by super admin. Returns JWT tokens with role and permissions.

Refresh admin access token using refresh token. Returns new access and refresh tokens. Access tokens expire in 1 hour, refresh tokens in 7 days. Frontend should implement auto-refresh before expiry for seamless UX.

Super admin only: Create new team member with role and permissions. Sends professional welcome email with account details, permissions breakdown, and login instructions. Roles: SUPER_ADMIN, BUSINESS_ADMIN, FINANCE_MANAGER, SUPPORT_MANAGER, CONTENT_MANAGER, OPERATIONS_MANAGER, TECHNICAL_ADMIN
Super admin only: Get list of all team members with their roles, departments, and status
Super admin only: Get team statistics including total members, active/inactive counts, and role distribution
Super admin only: Update team member's role, department, permissions, or active status
Super admin only: Deactivate team member (soft delete). Super admin cannot deactivate themselves.

query.description: Filter by action type: SUPER_ADMIN_LOGIN, ADMIN_LOGIN, CREATED_ADMIN_USER, UPDATED_ADMIN_USER, DELETED_ADMIN_USER

request.description: Super admin only: Get activity logs for all admin actions. Includes user info, action type, entity details, and metadata.

Request password reset OTP. A 6-digit code will be sent to the admin's email via SendGrid using a professional HTML template (valid for 15 minutes). Email includes security warnings and best practices.
Reset password using OTP code. Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character. All existing sessions will be invalidated.
Change password while logged in. Requires authentication. Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character. All existing sessions will be invalidated.

Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including:
- Overview cards (vendors, customers, notifications, revenue) with growth metrics
- 12 months of booking statistics for charts
- 12 months of revenue data for charts
- Top 6 services by total revenue
- Recent activity with relative timestamps
- User statistics for last 30 days

Requires: JWT authentication and 'operations:view' permission

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Get the logged-in admin's complete profile information including:
- Personal details (name, email, phone, avatar)
- Role and permissions
- Department and admin role
- Profile completion percentage (calculated from 8 key fields)
- Team members created count
- Last login timestamp

Requires: JWT authentication

Update the logged-in admin's profile information. All fields are optional.

Fields:
- firstName, lastName, middleName: String
- email: Must be unique (validated)
- phoneNumber: String
- gender: String (e.g., Male, Female, Other)
- nationality: String (e.g., Nigeria, Kenya)
- department: String (e.g., Operations, Finance)
- avatar or profilePicture: URL string

Activity is logged as 'UPDATED_PROFILE'

Requires: JWT authentication

query.description: Search by order ID, customer name, or email
Filter by status: PENDING, CONFIRMED, CANCELLED, COMPLETED, REFUNDED

request.description: Get all orders/bookings with filters. Requires 'operations:view' permission.
Get order statistics: total, pending, confirmed, completed, refunded, cancelled, revenue, avg order value. Requires 'operations:view' permission.
Get detailed information about a specific order including customer, vendor, service, and payment details. Requires 'operations:view' permission.
Update order status. Status options: PENDING, CONFIRMED, CANCELLED, COMPLETED, REFUNDED. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

query.description: Filter by status: DRAFT, PENDING_REVIEW, ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED
Filter by visibility: PUBLIC, PRIVATE, HIDDEN
Filter by category: CAR_RENTAL, RESORT, FINE_DINING, CONVENIENCE_SERVICE

request.description: Get all listings with advanced filtering and pagination. Includes business details, booking counts, and revenue statistics. Requires 'content:view' permission.
Get comprehensive listing statistics including total counts by status, category distribution, total revenue, and average pricing. Requires 'content:view' permission.
Get detailed information about a specific listing including business details, recent bookings, and revenue statistics. Requires 'content:view' permission.
Approve a listing for publication. Changes status to ACTIVE and visibility to PUBLIC. Sends notification to vendor. Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Reject a listing with reason. Changes status to SUSPENDED. Sends notification to vendor with rejection reason. Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Change listing visibility. Options: PUBLIC (visible to all), PRIVATE (vendor only), HIDDEN (temporarily hidden). Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Toggle featured status for a listing. Featured listings appear prominently in search results and listings. Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Flag a listing for review. Sets isFlagged to true and stores the reason. Flagged listings may be temporarily hidden or require additional review. Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Update listing status and other properties. Status options: DRAFT, PENDING_REVIEW, ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED. Requires 'content:edit' permission.
Permanently delete a listing. Only allowed if listing has no active bookings. Requires 'content:delete' permission.

item.name: Admin - Customer Management
item.description: Customer account management, blocking/unblocking, and customer data access. All endpoints require admin authentication with appropriate permissions.

query.description: Search by name, email, or phone

request.description: Get all customers with pagination and filtering. Returns customer details including profile information, booking history summary, and account status. Requires 'user:view' permission.

Block a customer account. Blocked customers cannot make new bookings, access their account, or perform any platform activities. Requires 'user:manage' permission.

**Reason should be specific and documented for audit purposes.**

Customer will receive an email notification about the account suspension.

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Unblock a previously blocked customer account. Restores full access to platform features. Requires 'user:manage' permission.

**Reason should document why the block was lifted.**

Customer will receive an email notification about account reinstatement.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific customer including full profile, booking history, payment methods, and account activity. Requires 'user:view' permission.

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Support Tickets
item.description: Customer and vendor support ticket management. General platform support for account issues, technical problems, and inquiries.

item.name: ðŸ”µ Customer/Vendor Endpoints
item.description: Endpoints accessible by customers and vendors to manage their own support tickets.

body.raw:
{
  "type": "CUSTOMER",
  "category": "TECHNICAL_ISSUE",
  "subject": "Cannot upload profile picture",
  "description": "I've been trying to upload my profile picture for the past hour, but I keep getting an error message saying 'Upload failed'. I've tried different image formats (JPG, PNG) and sizes, but nothing works. Can you please help?",
  "priority": "MEDIUM"
}

request.description:
Create a new support ticket. Available to customers and vendors.

**Types:** CUSTOMER, BUSINESS
**Categories:** ACCOUNT_ISSUE, BOOKING_ISSUE, PAYMENT_ISSUE, TECHNICAL_ISSUE, BUSINESS_INQUIRY, REFUND_REQUEST, VERIFICATION_HELP, GENERAL_INQUIRY
**Priority:** LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, URGENT (optional, defaults to MEDIUM)

You can optionally link a booking or business by including `bookingId` or `businessId`.

After creation, a confirmation email is sent with the ticket number.

query.description: Filter by status: OPEN, IN_PROGRESS, WAITING_RESPONSE, RESOLVED, CLOSED, REOPENED

request.description:
Get all tickets created by the authenticated user (customer or vendor). Returns tickets with pagination and optional filters.

Customers see their personal tickets, vendors see tickets related to their businesses.

Get detailed information about a specific ticket including all messages and attachments.

Access control:
- Customers can view their own tickets
- Vendors can view tickets related to their businesses
- Admins can view all tickets

Add a message/reply to an existing ticket.

If the ticket is CLOSED or RESOLVED, it will be automatically reopened and status changed to REOPENED.

The ticket creator (customer/vendor) and assigned admin will receive email notifications about the new message.

Close a ticket when the issue is resolved from the customer's perspective.

Only the ticket creator (customer/vendor) can close their own tickets. Admins use the update endpoint to change status.

item.name: ðŸ”´ Admin Endpoints (Support Managers)
item.description: Admin endpoints for support managers and super admins. Requires SUPPORT:VIEW and SUPPORT:MANAGE permissions.

query.description: Filter by priority: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, URGENT
Search in ticket number, subject, description

request.description:
Get all support tickets with advanced filtering and search capabilities.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:VIEW

Support managers can view and manage all tickets across the platform. Use filters to narrow down tickets by status, priority, category, or assigned agent.

Get detailed ticket information including all messages (public and internal notes).

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:VIEW

Admins can see internal notes that are hidden from customers.

Update ticket status, priority, assignment, or tags.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:MANAGE

**Status Options:**
- OPEN: Initial state
- IN_PROGRESS: Agent working on it
- WAITING_RESPONSE: Waiting for customer reply
- RESOLVED: Issue fixed
- CLOSED: Ticket closed
- REOPENED: Ticket reopened after closure

**Priority:** LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, URGENT

Customer receives email notification when status or priority changes.

Add a public reply or internal note to a ticket.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:MANAGE

**Public Reply (isInternal: false):**
- Visible to customer
- Customer receives email notification
- Use for responses to customer

**Internal Note (isInternal: true):**
- Only visible to admins
- No email notification
- Use for team communication and notes

Add an internal note visible only to the admin team.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:MANAGE

Internal notes are useful for:
- Team collaboration
- Investigation progress
- Escalation notes
- Technical details
- Follow-up reminders

Customers will never see these messages.

Get comprehensive support ticket statistics for dashboard.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:VIEW

Includes:
- Total tickets count
- Breakdown by status (open, in progress, waiting, resolved, closed, reopened)
- Breakdown by priority (low, medium, high, urgent)
- Breakdown by category (account, booking, payment, technical, etc.)

Useful for dashboard widgets and reporting.

Get performance statistics for all support agents.

**Required Permission:** SUPPORT:VIEW

For each agent, returns:
- Total tickets assigned
- Active tickets count
- Resolved tickets count
- Average response time (in minutes)
- Agent details (name, email, avatar)

Useful for team management and performance monitoring.

item.name: ðŸ§ª Test Scenarios
item.description: Pre-configured test scenarios for common support workflows.

  "type": "CUSTOMER",

}

  "priority": "HIGH",
  "businessId": "{{businessId}}"
}

request.description: Test scenario: Vendor needs help with rejected business verification.

item.name: Admin - Finance Management
item.description: Finance settings, payouts, refunds, and payment tracking endpoints. All endpoints require admin authentication.

request.description: Get current finance settings including platform fees, VAT, service charges, payout configuration, and refund processing settings. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

Update finance settings. All fields are optional. Fee percentages must be between 0-100. This affects how commissions and fees are calculated for all bookings. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

**Live Calculation Example (â‚¦100,000 booking with defaults):**
- Booking Amount: â‚¦100,000
- VAT (7.5%): -â‚¦7,500
- Service Charge (5%): -â‚¦5,000
- Platform Fee (10%): -â‚¦10,000
- Gateway Fee (1.5% + â‚¦100): -â‚¦1,600
- **Vendor Payout: â‚¦75,900 (75.9%)**
Get finance dashboard overview including total revenue, pending payouts, monthly commission, active disputes, and pending refunds. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

query.description: Filter by status: REQUESTED, APPROVED, PROCESSING, PAID, FAILED

request.description: Get all vendor payout requests with filters. Shows transactions that have been requested for payout. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

Approve multiple payout requests. Changes status from REQUESTED to APPROVED. After approval, the payment microservice will process the actual payout via Paystack and send webhook confirmation. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

query.description: Filter by status: PENDING, UNDER_INVESTIGATION, APPROVED, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED, REJECTED
Filter by investigation status: PENDING, UNDER_REVIEW, INVESTIGATED

request.description: Get all customer refund requests with filters. Only customers can request refunds (not vendors/business owners). All refunds require admin investigation before approval. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "refunds": [
    {
      "id": "uuid",
      "refundId": "REF-2025-001",
      "orderId": "ORD-2025-123",
      "customer": {
        "id": "customer-uuid",
        "name": "Jane Customer",
        "email": "jane@customer.com"
      },
      "business": {
        "id": "business-uuid",
        "name": "Luxury Venues Ltd",
        "owner": {
          "name": "John Business Owner",
          "email": "john@luxuryvenues.com"
        }
      },
      "amount": 35000,
      "customerReason": "Service not rendered as described",
      "status": "PENDING",
      "investigationStatus": null,
      "investigationNotes": null,
      "isEligible": false,
      "policyViolation": null,
      "requestedAt": "2025-01-21T10:00:00.000Z",
      "investigatedAt": null,
      "processedAt": null,
      "approvedAt": null,
      "refundReference": null
    }
  ],
  "total": 8,
  "skip": 0,
  "take": 20
}

request.description:
Investigate a customer refund claim. Admin must contact both parties, review evidence, and determine if the business owner violated platform policies. Status changes from PENDING to UNDER_INVESTIGATION. Only eligible refunds (where policy was violated) can be approved. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

**Policy Violations**: SERVICE_NOT_PROVIDED, SERVICE_MISMATCH, SAFETY_VIOLATION, VENDOR_CANCELLATION, DOUBLE_BOOKING, LISTING_MISREPRESENTATION, EQUIPMENT_FAILURE, CAPACITY_VIOLATION, HYGIENE_VIOLATION, CONTRACT_BREACH

See REFUND_POLICY.md for complete eligibility criteria.

Approve an eligible refund after investigation. Can only approve if:
- Status is UNDER_INVESTIGATION
- isEligible is true (policy violation confirmed)

Status changes to APPROVED. Payment microservice will then process the refund via Stripe. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Reject a refund request that doesn't meet policy requirements. Can reject from PENDING or UNDER_INVESTIGATION status. Status changes to REJECTED. Customer will be notified with rejection reason. Requires 'operations:manage' permission.

Webhook endpoint to mark refund as completed. Called by payment microservice after successfully processing refund via Stripe. Status changes to COMPLETED and transaction status updated to REFUNDED. No authentication required (should validate webhook signature in production).

Get all completed booking payments with commission breakdown. Shows payment tracking including customer, vendor, amount, and platform commission. Includes total revenue and total commission summaries. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

Get recent finance-related activities including approved payouts, completed refunds, new disputes, and received payments. Shows the 5 most recent activities with relative timestamps. Requires 'operations:view' permission.

response.name: Success Response
